CustomField.description: Hidden field for use with Reports. Use this field to identify whether the Event Attendee attended the Event. This field is a formula field and uses "Day 1 Role," "Day 2 Role," etc. to automatically populate.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL ( Day_1_Role__c, "Member") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_1_Role__c, "Prospect") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_1_Role__c, "Guest") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_1_Role__c, "Speaker") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_1_Role__c, "Session Chair") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_1_Role__c, "Advisor") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_1_Role__c, "Staff") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role__c, "Member") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role__c, "Prospect") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role__c, "Guest") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role__c, "Speaker") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role__c, "Session Chair") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role__c, "Advisor") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role__c, "Staff") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_Role__c , "Member") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_Role__c, "Prospect") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_Role__c, "Guest") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_Role__c, "Speaker") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_Role__c, "Session Chair") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_Role__c, "Advisor") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_Role__c, "Staff") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_3_Role__c, "Member") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_3_Role__c, "Prospect") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_3_Role__c, "Guest") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_3_Role__c, "Speaker") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_3_Role__c, "Session Chair") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_3_Role__c, "Advisor") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_3_Role__c, "Staff") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_2_Role__c, "Member") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_2_Role__c, "Prospect") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_2_Role__c, "Guest") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_2_Role__c, "Speaker") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_2_Role__c, "Session Chair") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_2_Role__c, "Advisor") || ISPICKVAL ( Dinner_2_Role__c, "Staff") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role_TC__c, "Member")|| ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role_TC__c, "Prospect") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role_TC__c, "Guest") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role_TC__c, "Speaker") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role_TC__c, "Session Chair") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role_TC__c, "Advisor") || ISPICKVAL ( Day_2_Role_TC__c, "Staff") , "Yes", "No")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Hidden field for use with Reports. Use this field to identify whether the Event Attendee attended the Event. This field is a formula field and uses "Day 1 Role," "Day 2 Role," etc. to automatically populate.
CustomField.label: Attended?
